author: pburba
msg: Follow-up to r36404, fix potential segfault.
(close_edit): svn_client__get_diff_editor allocates eb in a subpool, but
also sets eb->pool to that subpool, so check eb->svnpath_stream, *then*

author: hwright
msg: (tweak_entries): Add an early-out to avoid reading entries unless we need to.

author: hwright
msg: Following up on my threats to remove contrib/ from our distribution:
* Don't ship contrib/ in our distribution tarball
* Remove contrib/ from our configure and build process
Strip contrib/ from the distribution tarballs.

author: lgo
msg: Fix issue in 'blame -g' where all chunks are not correctly
identified as part of the same merged revision.
(small tweaks, removed some changes, unneeded to make this test pass).
in the chain or merged chain, instead of losing some

author: hwright
msg: Make svn_wc__entry_is_hidden() return an error, and set the hidden value
through an output variable.  Although this is a bit more work, it allows us
to use the stack tracing functionality for some other development work within
Plus, this API will eventually disappear, anyway.
(svn_wc__entry_is_hidden): Change the return type and add an output param.
